text: Kathryn Jean Whitmire (n√©e Niederhofer; born August 15, 1946) is an American politician, businesswoman, and accountant. She was the 57th Mayor of Houston from 1982 to 1992. She was the city's first female mayor. ==References== ==Other websites== * Whitmire, Mayor Kathy and Jim Barlow. Mayor Kathy Whitmire Oral History, Houston Oral History Project, July 14, 2008. * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Houston Category:Businesspeople from Houston Category:Academics from Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Kathy Whitmire
